ObjectClass.Name: Mound
ObjectClass.Description:
MOUND:
Robust tech/comm and raider hub
Performs tech tree and comm upgrades Detects cloaked units Produces Cuttles Can move itself

Objective.Name: Turn Auto Hierarchy ON
Objective.Details: \Enable Automatic Hierarchy\Makes units find higher ranked\commanders by proximity

Objective.Name: Turn Smart Idle ON
Objective.Details: \Enable auto-communication\Make units automatically request\and respond when help is needed\ Heal, Repair, Recover and Find

Objective.Name: Make Cuttle/Todaro Pair
Objective.Details: Biological light raider aircraft\Very fast with low combat stamina\Good scout and expendable harasser\Limited lifespan

Objective.Name: Upgrade Adv Structures
Objective.Details: \Enable building Spyre and Dome\Enable OCTO shield regen L1

Objective.Name: Upgrade Loligo Splicing
Objective.Details: \Enables Meiotic Progenesis (Ligos)\Enables Gestation ability (Hydra/Sepiligo)\Eliminates need for Spyres (Pod progenitors)

Objective.Name: Upgrade Specials
Objective.Details: \Enable special abilities:\Keeper Cloak, Chronobomb, Nanite Infect\and Disruptor Beam\Blocks Weapons tech

Objective.Name: Upgrade Weapons
Objective.Details: \Enables OCTO shield regen L2\and Medusa/Pharoligo Disruptor Beam\Increases Dome rate-of-fire\Blocks Specials tech

Objective.Name: Upgrade Chronoporting
Objective.Details: \Enable self chronoports for all\Grekim units\ \Must upgrade Adv Structures
